text: East Germany national football team was the national football team of the German Democratic Republic (GDR or East Germany) from 1952 to 1990. The East Germany team is now the Germany team. == Record== === FIFA World Cup === East Germany only qualified for one World Cup, and they only made it to round 2. * 1950 - Did not enter * 1954 - Did not enter * 1958 to 1970 - Did not qualify * 1974 - Round 2 * 1978 to 1990 - Did not qualify === European Championship === East Germany never qualified for a UEFA European Football Championship tournament. * 1960 to 1988 - Did not qualify * 1992 - Left to qualification round == References == Category:Football in Germany Category:European national football teams Category:Sport in East Germany
title: East Germany national football team
